info.name: Calendar
info.description:
The Calendar app is a user interface for Nextcloud's CalDAV server. Easily sync events from various devices with your Nextcloud and edit them online.
* 🚀 **Integration with other Nextcloud apps!** Currently Contacts - more to come. * 🌐 **WebCal Support!** Want to see your favorite team’s matchdays in your calendar? No problem! * 🙋 **Attendees!** Invite people to your events. * 🙈 **We’re not reinventing the wheel!** Based on the great [davclient.js](https://github.com/evert/davclient.js), [ical.js](https://github.com/mozilla-comm/ical.js) and [fullcalendar](https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar) libraries.
info.author: Georg Ehrke
Raghu Nayyar
Thomas Citharel
